title: The norcal comcast issue is back...
body:
Who do I officially bitch to to get them off of their asses to fix it?  Is it comcast?  or is it you guy's?  This has been 3 to 4 days now of the most buggy game play and interface for group select I have experienced in this game since I began playing 3 years ago.

I'm seriously just about done with this...  Why waste my time being furious at a sub par gaming experience?   You know what, nvm answered my own damn question.

replies.body:
The issues hitting the West Coast definitely seem to be ISP related.  I recently made a post about this issue with some further info [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Rf9Kx2Ed-northern-california-connectivity-issues?comment=0003).

Hopefully this can get resolved ASAP!
